metadata.title: About me | José Duque
metadata.description: Colombian web developer. Explore my portfolio, expertise, and comprehensive services to elevate your digital presence.

resume.excerpt1: Colombian Software Engineer with more than {years} years of experience in web application development.
resume.excerpt2: I am focused on guaranteeing quality solutions based on good practices with technologies on monolithic architectures as well as microservices architectures.

description.title: Overview
description.content:
My professional experience has provided a broad view of client-specific needs necessary to solve diverse technological challenges. I have served as a consultant, tech-lead, and tech-coordinator for development teams within both the public and private sectors. This includes work for organizations such as the Alcaldía de Itagüí, Alcaldía de Bogotá, Ministerio de Educación Nacional, and EAFIT University.



I've also driven custom development projects and website creation for full-time marketing agencies and as an independent freelancer. Through collaborations with software factories, I’ve delivered solutions for regional educational startups, banking, insurance, and healthcare, sectors that demand rigorous adherence to policy and quality.



To specialize in popular technologies, I completed intensive learning sessions on languages like Node.js, PHP and Java and conducted individual studies on Frontend technologies like React, React Native and Vue.js. On the backend, my focus on microservices architectures using Amazon Web Services (AWS) and Azure DevOps has profiled me as a competent Full-Stack Developer ready for current market demands.

content.role: Boot-camp Node JS - Ruta N Corporation - Ceiba Software S.A.S - Globant
Software Engineering - Politécnico Colombiano Jaime Isaza Cadavid

metadata.title: Projects | José Duque
metadata.description: Latest projects where I had been contributed

Experience.title: Projects showcase
Experience.subtitle: Responsabilities
Experience.no-results: There are no projects that match the selected filters, try again
Experience.showcase-end: Hey! the journey started from here!

resume: Streamlined vehicle/lease/travel insurance sales processes by designing serverless Azure solutions and RESTful APIs.

Solved critical integration challenges between Suratech (Salesforce) and SURA Colombia core business systems by implementing a robust Event-Driven Architecture utilizing RabbitMQ and Azure Service Bus.

content.enterprise: Aval Digital Labs - Aval AV Villas Group - Ceiba Software S.A.S
content.project: Aval Digital Labs - AV Villas Bank / Credit Card Infrastructure Migration team
resume: Modernized legacy AWS infrastructure by migrating to Infrastructure as Code (Serverless Framework & Terraform), ensuring strict enterprise standards and architectural governance for Aval Digital Labs and Banco AV Villas
Boosted execution performance of AWS Lambdas and Step Functions by refactoring and optimizing legacy Node.js, Java, and Spring Boot monoliths.
Surpassed 85% compliance on Code Quality Gates and hardened application security by implementing policies and vulnerability fixes in accordance with OWASP standards.
Enabled seamless migration without production downtime by engineering a parallel development strategy that allowed new business components to be deployed alongside active migration loads.

content.enterprise: Aval Digital Labs & Los Nogales school - MentuApp - Ceiba Software S.A.S
resume: Architected a high-availability learning platform for primary and secondary education, implementing Hexagonal Architecture and AWS Serverless (Node.js/TypeScript) to ensure system resilience and maintainability.

Orchestrated modular infrastructure strategies using Serverless Framework and CloudFormation to decouple Lambda functions, seamlessly integrating API Gateway, S3, SNS, and SQS with the enterprise data lake.
Engineered an automated ETL pipeline triggered by AWS EventBridge to deliver standardized, real-time data to Metabase, enabling accurate reporting and analytics.

Designed a Micro-Frontend architecture using React.js and Webpack Module Federation to segment business logic, while establishing a shared UI component library via Storybook to ensure design consistency.
Enabled data-driven user engagement strategies by integrating advanced analytics tools (Mixpanel, Concerto, Hotjar, Google Analytics) to track teacher and student behavior.
Defined and implemented a Hexagonal Architecture grounded in Domain-Driven Design (DDD) and SOLID principles to maximize maintainability.
Guaranteed code quality and stability by establishing a Continuous Integration (CI) pipeline featuring automated testing and static code analysis.
Built a scalable frontend architecture based on a shared Core and feature-based design, implementing Redux to centralize and optimize global state management.
Architected a Headless WordPress solution from scratch, exposing custom RESTful APIs to drive dynamic content for the client application.
Developed a rich multimedia frontend using AngularJS, integrating specialized libraries to manage, render, and manipulate complex media content.
Implemented accessible User Experience (UX) strategies specifically tailored for a senior demographic (50+), ensuring ease of use and high adoption rates.
Optimized high-traffic media delivery by implementing a CDN strategy using AWS S3 and CloudFront, ensuring low latency and high availability for global users.
Integrated enterprise security by connecting SEUS 4 (Active Directory/SAML) with a WordPress/WooCommerce platform to enable secure authentication.
Architected a custom WordPress plugin using the MVC pattern, ensuring a strict separation of concerns and maintainability in alignment with industry best practices.
Engineered a custom reporting module that aggregates data from disparate sources (Google Docs, external REST APIs) and generates unified CSV reports.
Delivered a high-quality solution that strictly adhered to all functional requirements and software quality standards mandated by the client.

content.enterprise: Zenú meat foods - Colombia - SM Digital
content.project: Corporate Zenú - Game Advance and learn!
resume: Developed a scalable frontend from scratch using Angular 7, strictly adhering to the official Angular Style Guide architecture.
Ensured long-term maintainability by enforcing Clean Code principles and framework-specific design patterns throughout the codebase.

content.project: Familia Group Co - Napkin simulator - SM Digital
resume: Architected a custom Full-Stack Product Configurator (for custom napkins) within WordPress, built from scratch to meet specific interactive requirements.
Engineered a dynamic DOM manipulation engine using jQuery, ensuring compatibility with the client’s legacy infrastructure constraints.
Translated strict brand identity guidelines into pixel-perfect functional requirements and UI components.
Developed a full CRUD administrative dashboard, allowing non-technical staff to easily manage, edit, and update custom product templates via an intuitive interface.
Implemented a Lead Generation workflow that delivered custom designs via email, successfully converting user engagement into tangible business leads.

content.project: Insa (NORGAS) - Energy quote simulator - SM Digital
resume: Developed a lightweight, dependency-free frontend application from scratch using Vanilla JavaScript, optimizing for performance without the overhead of external frameworks.
Engineered a high-precision Quoting Engine involving complex calculation logic; collaborated closely with the client to validate algorithms against strict corporate quality policies.
Automated the Continuous Deployment (CD) process by configuring scheduled tasks (Cron jobs) on a cloud-based server.
Developed a custom Full-Stack solution from scratch
Architected a bespoke plugin using the MVC (Model-View-Controller) pattern, ensuring code modularity and adherence to strict development best practices.
Engineered a fully configurable calculation and evaluation engine, capable of processing complex logic to generate dynamic PDF reports and email notifications.
Optimized the system for Marketing and Digital Guidelines, providing the client with a flexible administrative interface to manage results and user engagement strategies.

content.project: SM Digital - Website development & Custom Integrations between third parties
resume: Engineered custom WordPress architectures, modularizing complex business logic into bespoke plugins following industry best practices.
Developed high-performance custom themes from scratch, ensuring fully responsive design and SEO optimization to drive traffic and maximize client revenue.
Deployed full-scale e-commerce solutions featuring deep integrations with Payment Gateways, ERPs, CRMs, and marketing lead-gen platforms.
Implemented secure Single Sign-On (SSO) authentication to allow user access via social networks (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram).
Automated client communication workflows using the official WhatsApp Business API, streamlining the delivery of reports and notifications.
Leveraged a diverse Full Stack environment (HTML, CSS, jQuery, Angular, React, PHP, Node.js) to build custom web applications and middleware integrators for unsupported platforms.

content.project: EAFIT University - Plataforma Línea en Informática Educativa (Imaginar futuros)
resume: Developed a bespoke PHP application on the WordPress framework, adhering to industry-standard plugin development practices.
Built interactive user interfaces leveraging jQuery and AJAX to manage real-time data flow between the client and server.
Managed AWS cloud infrastructure (S3, Glacier, CloudFront, Route 53) to optimize storage and content delivery.
Administered enterprise cloud services including Microsoft Azure and Office 365 to support user management and collaboration tools.

Pdf.introduction:
I consider myself a person with a profile based on responsibility, I am an active, recursive, creative, and orderly developer. I have knowledge in TypeScript, Javascript, and PHP with UML, XML, SQL/NoSQL.
I like so much web programming in general and I am pretty interested in developing a Full-Stack profile. I have a special taste for new technologies and give it all in each project.
Pdf.cicd: Jenkins, Github Actions, SonarQube, Docker, CircleCI
Pdf.backend: Nest JS, Node JS, Express, Spring Boot, RabbitMQ, Azure Service Bus, Amazon SQS, Laravel, Next JS
Pdf.frontend: HTML, CSS, React JS, , Vue JS, SASS, Tailwind, Redux, Pinia
Pdf.cloud: Amazon Web Services, Azure Cloud, Terraform, Serverless framework
Pdf.architecture: Hexagonal Architecture, CQRS, MVC, Microservices, Event Driven Architecture.
